page.title: 04FAMILY LIFE
page.content: MY FAMILY AS A WHOLE USUALLY SPENDS A FAIR AMOUNT OF ITS SPARE TIME GOING ON WALKS. WHEN WE WALK MY SISTER IS ALWAYS PICKING FLOWERS AND TRYING TO CLIMB TREES. MY DAD AND MY MUM LOOK FOR BIRDS, I WALK ALONG PLAYING WITH OUR DOG. WHEN WE GET HOME MY SISTER ASKS MY MUM TO PUT THE PLANTS IN WATER. MY SISTER LIKES SINGING TO SONGS ON TELEVISION, NOT THE WORDS, JUST 'LA-LA' AND SWINGS HER ARMS ROUND VIOLENTLY. SHE LIKES PICKING THE BUDS OF MUM'S PLANTS AND KNOCKING THE STUFFING OUT OF HER TOY TEDDY BEAR. MY MUM'S HOBBIES ARE READING ROMANCE STORIES AND KNITTING MULTI-COLOURED CLOTHES. DAD LIKES GARDENING AND PLAYING ON THE COMPUTER AND I LIKE TRAIN SPOTTING AND PLAYING FOOTBALL.
